content: अभिप्राय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [इ-अच्] Going near, approaching; aiming at, intending, meaning, accruing to; कर्माभिप्राये क्रियाफले <ls>P. I. 3. 72.</ls> --यः {@--1@} Aim, purpose, object, intention, wish, desire; अभिप्राया न सिद्ध्यंति तेनेदं वर्तते जगत् <ls>Pt. 1. 158</ls>; साभिप्रायाणि वचांसि <ls>Pt. 2</ls> earnest words; भावः कवेरभिप्रायः {@--2@} Meaning, sense, import, implied sense of a word, passage &c.; तेषामयमभिप्रायः such is the meaning intended, import (of the passage &c.). {@--3@} Opinion, belief. {@--4@} Relation, reference. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu.
